name: UpdateTaskCustomField
description:
Update a custom field value for a specific task in ClickUp.

Use this tool to add data to a custom field on a task. Requires the `task_id` of the task and the `field_id` of the custom field. Retrieve `field_id` using the 'Get Accessible Custom Fields' or 'Get Task' endpoints.

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The ID of the task to be updated with new custom field data.

value_schema.description: Enter the task ID of the task you want to update.

parameters.name: custom_field_uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the custom field to update for a specific task.

value_schema.description: Enter the universal unique identifier (UUID) of the Custom Field you want to set.

parameters.name: custom_field_value_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing the data to set for the custom field on the task.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: Provide the Workspace ID when referencing a task by its Custom Task ID (`custom_task_ids` must be true).

value_schema.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.

 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

parameters.name: use_custom_task_id_reference
parameters.description: Set to `true` to reference a task using its Custom Task ID.

value_schema.description: If you want to reference a task by its Custom Task ID, this value must be `true`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

parameters.name: custom_task_ids
parameters.description: If you want to reference a task by its Custom Task ID, this value must be `true`.

value_schema.description: If you want to reference a task by its Custom Task ID, this value must be `true`.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.

 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

value_schema.description:
When the `custom_task_ids` parameter is set to `true`, the Workspace ID must be provided using the `team_id` parameter.

 \
For example: `custom_task_ids=true&team_id=123`.

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: Enter the task ID of the task you want to update.

value_schema.description: Enter the task ID of the task you want to update.

parameters.name: field_id
parameters.description: Enter the universal unique identifier (UUID) of the Custom Field you want to set.

value_schema.description: Enter the universal unique identifier (UUID) of the Custom Field you want to set.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
